alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 7:50PM EDT until June 17 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN ACCOMACK AND NORTHAMPTON COUNTIES... At 750 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Parksley to Exmore to 6 miles southeast of Cape Charles, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Onancock around 755 PM EDT. Parksley around 800 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Capeville, Kiptopeke State Park, Harborton, Melfa, Eastville, Franktown, Cheapside, Kiptopeke, Painter and Keller. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
